data.title: Gli zombie al cinema, dagli anni ’30 agli anni ’90
data.meta_description: Una raccolta essenziale, per conoscere i migliori o i peggiori film sugli zombi - 1932 WHITE ZOMBIE USA, b/w, 70 min Director Victor Halperin Writer Garnett We
data.text:
Una raccolta essenziale, per conoscere i migliori o i peggiori film sugli zombi

– 1932 WHITE ZOMBIE USA, b/w, 70 min Director Victor Halperin Writer Garnett Weston Make-Up Jack Pierce Composer Abe Meyer Producer Edward Halperin Actors Bela Lugosi Madge Bellamy John Harron Robert Frazer Brandon Hurst Joseph Cawtorn

– 1936 REVOLT OF THE ZOMBIES USA, b/w, 63 min Director Victor Halperin Writer Howard Higgins Rollo Lloyd Victor Halperin SpFX Ray Merces Composer Abe Meyer Producer Edward Halperin Actors Dean Jagger Roy D’Arcy Dorothy Stone Robert Noland George Cleveland Fred Warren

– 1940 THE GHOST BREAKERS USA, b/w, 79 min Director George Marshall Writer Walter De Leon Composer Ernst Toch Producer Paramount Actors Bob Hope Paulette Godard Richard Carlson Paul Likas Noble Johnson Willie Best Anthony Quinn

– 1941 KING OF THE ZOMBIES USA, b/w, 65 min Director Jean Yarbrough Writer Edmund Keslo Composer Edward Kay Producer Mongram Actors Dick Purcell Joan Woodburry Mantan Moreland Henry Victor John Archer

L’ALCHIMISTA NON percepisce ed è contraria ai finanziamenti pubblici (anche il 5 per mille). La sua forza sono iscrizioni e contributi donati da chi ci ritiene utile.
